title: John Coltrane - Live in Japan (1966) [4CD]
description:
The 4-CD set Ã¢â‚¬Å“Live in JapanÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, recorded over two nights in Tokyo in July 1966, compiles all the music by the John Coltrane Quintet issued as three albums in the 70s by Impulse! : 
Concert in Japan (1973)
Coltrane in Japan (1974) 
Second Night in Tokyo (1976)
John Coltrane (heard on tenor, soprano, and alto) engages in some ferocious interplay with Pharoah Sanders (on tenor, alto, and bass clarinet), pianist Alice Coltrane, bassist Jimmy Garrison, and drummer Rashied Ali. "Live in Japan" shows Coltrane's last band in full flight, loaded with fierce improvisational chops and stretching the music to its outer limits, an area of no boundaries or limits whatsoever. ColtraneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s thirst for new sounds is fundamentally intertwined with his desire to see the universe from a new, higher perspective, and this is why his music exudes its spiritual, even cosmic aura. 


John Coltrane

Live in Japan

1966


  4CDs / 1991 / 320Kbps


Tracklist:

Disc 1: 

1. Afro Blue (38:49)	

2. Peace On Earth (26:24)


Disc 2: 

1. Crescent (54:34)	


Disc 3: 

1. Peace On Earth (25:04) 

2. Leo (44:51)


Disc 4:

1. My Favorite Things (57:19)


Discs 1 & 2 were recorded at Shinjuku Kosei Nenkin Hall in Tokyo on July 11, 1966. 
Discs 3 & 4 recorded at Sankei Hall in Tokyo on July 22, 1966. 
These recordings are mono and were originally taped for Japanese radio broadcast.


Personnel:

John Coltrane - soprano, alto and tenor saxophones, bass clarinet, percussion

Alice Coltrane - piano

Pharoah Sanders - alto and tenor saxophones, bass clarinet, percussion

Jimmy Garrison - bass

Rashied Ali - drums


John Coltrane / Live in Japan / 1966
